languages.text: {n}Соломон закрывает глаза и молчит, будто молится про себя. Наконец он тихо выдыхает:{/n} "Давайте уже пойдем и убьем кого-нибудь".
{n}Solomorne closes his eyes and lapses into silence as if he is praying. At last, he sighs.{/n} "Let's move out and kill someone already."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон закрывает глаза и молчит, будто молится про себя. Наконец он тихо выдыхает:{/n} "Давайте уже пойдем и убьем кого-нибудь".

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and lapses into silence as if he is praying. At last, he sighs.{/n} "Let's move out and kill someone already."

{n}Solomorne closes his eyes and lapses into silence as if he is praying. At last, he sighs.{/n} "Let's move out and kill someone already."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne ferme les yeux et se tait un instant, comme s'il priait, puis il pousse un soupir et dit :{/n} « Allons-y, il me démange de tuer quelqu'un. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and lapses into silence as if he is praying. At last, he sighs.{/n} "Let's move out and kill someone already."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne ferme les yeux et se tait un instant, comme s'il priait, puis il pousse un soupir et dit :{/n} « Allons-y, il me démange de tuer quelqu'un. »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは目を閉じ、まるで祈っているかのように静かに黙り込んだ。ついに彼はため息をついた。{/n}「さあ、もう出発して、さっさと誰かをぶっ殺しましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and lapses into silence as if he is praying. At last, he sighs.{/n} "Let's move out and kill someone already."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは目を閉じ、まるで祈っているかのように静かに黙り込んだ。ついに彼はため息をついた。{/n}「さあ、もう出発して、さっさと誰かをぶっ殺しましょう」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne cierra los ojos y guarda silencio, como si rezara para dentro. Después, suspira.{/n} «Vamos a matar algo de una vez».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and lapses into silence as if he is praying. At last, he sighs.{/n} "Let's move out and kill someone already."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne cierra los ojos y guarda silencio, como si rezara para dentro. Después, suspira.{/n} «Vamos a matar algo de una vez».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙闭上了眼睛，陷入了沉默，仿佛在祈祷。到最后，他叹了口气。{/n}“我们还是赶紧动手杀人吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and lapses into silence as if he is praying. At last, he sighs.{/n} "Let's move out and kill someone already."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙闭上了眼睛，陷入了沉默，仿佛在祈祷。到最后，他叹了口气。{/n}“我们还是赶紧动手杀人吧。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, gözlerini kapatıp dua edermişçesine sessizliğe gömülüyor. En sonunda iç çekiyor.{/n} "Gidip birilerini öldürelim bari."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and lapses into silence as if he is praying. At last, he sighs.{/n} "Let's move out and kill someone already."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne gözlerini kapatıp dua edermişçesine sessizliğe gömülüyor. En sonunda iç çekiyor.{/n} "Devam edelim de birilerini öldürelim bari."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne schließt seine Augen und versinkt in Schweigen, als würde er beten. Schließlich seufzt er.{/n} "Wir sollten aufbrechen und endlich jemanden töten."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and lapses into silence as if he is praying. At last, he sighs.{/n} "Let's move out and kill someone already."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne schließt seine Augen und versinkt in Schweigen, als würde er beten. Schließlich seufzt er.{/n} "Wir sollten aufbrechen und endlich jemanden töten."
